question: Amit Sinha was appointed as the Chief Operating Officer of _____________.
explanation: Amit Sinha has been appointed as the chief operating officer (COO) of its e-commerce business Paytm Mall. He is the current Vice President of Business and Human Resources at Paytm's Parent Company. He will be responsible for overall operations of Paytm Mall and expand the team to ensure customers have access to the widest assortment of products.
